name: The Batman
title: Pattinson can remove Twilight from his resume.
review: I hesitate to say that a movie is perfect, especially after a first viewing. But gosh dang if this isn't close. And boy does it earn its beefy three hour runtime. Batman was always meant to be a film noir. And it is incredible to me that we haven't seen this before now. This is a mystery crime drama film that happens to feature Batman.

name: Moon Knight
title: Highly recommended it to all comic fans
review: I loved the whole ep, Oscar Isaac is perfect for this role. I can't really talk to much about it but the way they presented moon knight was a kids dream , super cool and true to what a hero is . I don't think I got that moved ever for a superhero introduction.
